word: Dyspepsia Leads to Irritability.--A dyspeptic stomach always leads to irritability. A sour stomach leads to a sour temper. Your body must be kept in subjection if you make it a meet temple for the indwelling of the Holy Spirit. . . . Eat sparingly of even wholesome food. Exercise moderately, and you will feel that your life is of some account.--Lt 27, 1872.
